channel.title: shelly scene on Shelly CLI
channel.description: Recent content in shelly scene on Shelly CLI

item.title: shelly scene activate
item.description:
shelly scene activate

Activate a scene

Synopsis

Execute all actions defined in a scene.

Actions are executed concurrently for faster execution. Use –dry-run to preview actions without executing them.

Examples

Options

Options inherited from parent commands

SEE ALSO

  • shelly scene - Manage device scenes

item.title: shelly scene create
item.description:
shelly scene create

Create a new scene

Synopsis

Create a new empty scene.

After creating a scene, use ‘shelly scene add-action’ to add device actions, or import an existing scene definition from a file.

Examples

Options

Options inherited from parent commands

SEE ALSO

  • shelly scene - Manage device scenes

item.title: shelly scene delete
item.description:
shelly scene delete

Delete a scene

Synopsis

Delete a saved scene permanently.

Examples

Options

Options inherited from parent commands

SEE ALSO

  • shelly scene - Manage device scenes

item.title: shelly scene export
item.description:
shelly scene export

Export a scene to file

Synopsis

Export a scene definition to a file.

If no file is specified, outputs to stdout. Format is auto-detected from file extension (.json, .yaml, .yml).

Examples

Options

Options inherited from parent commands

SEE ALSO

  • shelly scene - Manage device scenes

item.title: shelly scene import
item.description:
shelly scene import

Import a scene from file

Synopsis

Import a scene definition from a file.

Format is auto-detected from file extension (.json, .yaml, .yml). Use –name to override the scene name from the file.

Examples

Options

Options inherited from parent commands

SEE ALSO

  • shelly scene - Manage device scenes

item.title: shelly scene list
item.description:
shelly scene list

List scenes

Synopsis

List all configured scenes.

Output is formatted as a table by default. Use -o json or -o yaml for structured output suitable for scripting.

Examples

Options

Options inherited from parent commands

SEE ALSO

  • shelly scene - Manage device scenes

item.title: shelly scene show
item.description:
shelly scene show

Show scene details

Synopsis

Display detailed information about a scene including all its actions.
